name: ship-december
description: A VS Code extension for managing ship-december daily folders

scripts._comment_copylib: Copies shared lib from day-5/lib/ into out/lib/ - this lib is shared with index.js and md-to-cards.js
scripts._comment_compile: Compiles TypeScript and copies shared lib to output
scripts._comment_watch: Watches both TypeScript files and shared lib for changes, recompiling/copying as needed
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.publish: npm version patch && npm run compile && vsce package && code --install-extension ship-december-$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").vsix
